verbs.description: If [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: knew] [ARG1: anything] [ARG2: about history] , he would be worried about his success with North Korea .
If Donald Trump knew anything about history , he [V: would] be worried about his success with North Korea .
[ARGM-ADV: If Donald Trump knew anything about history] , [ARG1: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: be] [ARG2: worried about his success with North Korea] .
